node.title: Episode 1- Riverside Farm Institute
node.description: Riverside Farm Institute is a supporting ministry in Zambia working in cooperation with the Seventh-day Adventist Church. Its mission is four-fold: to train, evangelize, serve the community, and be self-sustaining. It's dedicated team accomplishes this through medical missionary outreach, a lifestyle center, direct ministry of God’s word, adult education programs, and a productive farm.
